name: Dee Gee Johnson
text:
Wonderful fresh tasty food. Thanks for the keto crust! The staff was friendly and very helpful. This was our first time at Blaze and we'll be back.
The only reason they don't get the fifth star is because its difficult to …More

text:
We have been coming here over the years, when they first opened.

The employees have changed but the pizza has always been consistently great. …More

name: Phillip Bergner
text: Handmade dough, fresh ingredients, and good service add up to an enjoyable lunch. The original dough was just a touch chewy but very tasty. This location is a few hundred feet away from a California Pizza Kitchen. Depending on your tastes, …More

name: Deplorable Rob
text:
This is pretty much my go-to place to eat whenever I come to Old Orchard.

Always clean venue with good customer service serving up quality pies and sides …More

name: Roman Bryant
text: I eat here a lot since I work right next to it. I love how the service is always excellent and they keep the spot well organized regularly. Pricing is affordable and they serve sizeable portions.

name: Joe Cunningham
text:
Good food

text: Great place! This location has always been amazing. Friendly staff, consistent quality, and an easy location

name: Anthony Braun
text: Worst pizza I have ever had. I got the keto crust and it was not good in fact it was horrible. The amount veggies on the pizza was sad and not worth the money said sald was meh only reason I gave it 2 stars was that thier refreshers drinks are really good.

name: Mr Markus79
text: Food was great, I don't eat pork and unfortunately they don't have a huge option to choose from if your not a pork eater. But with the chicken it was still very good.

name: Rey Garcia
text: The pizza I ordered didn't have much flavor.  I had the thick crust pizza so not sure if that makes a difference.

name: J J
text: Vegan pizza with vegan chorizo is very tasty, great for kids.

name: Mike Mac
text: It was awesome. Pizza phenomenal.  It was our first time there. Taylor took great care of us walked us through the whole process. Definitely go back again.

name: Michael Hopkins
text: Let's face it! Your in Chicago the home of great pizza! Blaze is industrial pizza where you really taste the cut rate ingredients! The  crust is wafer thin, cheese amount dispersed is scant. Sauce tastes decent and it is a basic pizza at …More

name: gloria walker
text: Nice Clean ,Very Pleasant Work Staff, The Veggie Pizza IS OFF THE CHAIN Y'ALL . The crust is thin but not floppy but not too hard , the sauce is kinda sweet but not too sweet the veggies are fresh you get two cheeses mozzarella chese and …More

name: Jon Daniel Dinopol
text: Not one star because I love blaze pizza, but i dunno about the staff and branch here. Let's just say I paid 20 bucks for burnt pizza. We were the first and only customers, so I don't know what happened.

name: Petar Pajić
text: Good pizza. If you live nearby the pizza is most likely done by the time you drive there from home, no need to wait for online orders. It quick and doesn’t break the bank. Better pizza spots around? Sure. But this is a good fast spot for Old Orchard.

name: Julia Cornejo
text: This place gets worse and worse everytime I come back. The customer service is trash and they’re so slow and lazy. I wish it didn’t decline so much so quickly. Please retrain your staff.

name: Laura Lerner
text: Food is good... Service at this location is variable; at times, folks behind the counter aren't very interested in listening to what you want and we run into a lot of really dirty tables even when there are people behind the counter standing around. Other times, the whole experience is really nice for fast food pizza.

name: Franklin Parks
text: This place is disgusting. We walked in and the two people up front had no expression, nothing at all - not even a little grin. Didn’t speak clearly enough, and the ingredients here look disgusting and not fresh at all. When the pizza was …More

name: William Cusick
text: It was an amazing experience with tons of great options for everyone to choose from. I would eat there everyday if I could.

name: Brandi Barnett
text: The food was amazing! Great concept. Didn't give it the full 5 stars because they seemed understaffed and took too long...

name: Katarzyna Okularczyk
text: Meh... Pizza was good, but very small, barely enough for 2 people,  if there are 3 of you, even if one is a kid, order 2 pizzas. Salads have good ingredients but dressings are pretty awful (don't get the Greek, it's VERY sour, ranch is much better ANYWHERE else, even at Jewel...).

name: Karma Al-Kubaisy
text: Always good to eat here .. delicious pizzas:)

name: Bernie
text: Avoid the Skokie location and travel a bit further south to the Niles location on Touhy Ave. We ordered a cheese and an Art Lover, and both were severely undercooked. I understand they were busy due to Niles North students also being there, …More

name: Dustin L. Derry
text: Quick, Cheap, tasty, relatively healthy.  A rare combination these day.  If you want pizza, I cannot recommend this place enough.  Think, Chipotle for pizza.  Have a s'mores treat and have them warm it in the oven... sooooo GOOOD!!!

name: Faruk Menkovic
text:
*** UPDATE***

They had the pizza ready the whole time while I almost waited for a whole other …More

name: David Hong
text: Quick and clean just like most other blaze pizzas. They usually have all the ingredients ready to go without running out.   Bathrooms are clean.

name: susan nussbaum
text: I can't believe this place. I am a crust and vegie person. The crust was crisp all the way thru and the amount of veggies they offered was wonderful. In addition they offer different cheese options. …More

name: Monica
text: Look at the reviews before ever going to THIS location. Let me start of by saying I've typically never had anything but good Blaze experiences but this was a whole different experience. We got there and it really wasn't too busy, maybe 3 …More

name: Vanessa Halas
text: Very bad service. The workers were very ignorant and barely paid attention to what I wanted. I felt very disrespected and when I asked for olives one of the workers literally threw olives on my pizza. In general the place is dirty and it’s not a good environment to enjoy your food.

name: Joseph Sparks
text: Fresh ingredients. High rise pizza is delicious.  Vegan options. Great value.

name: hisham hassan
text: Friendly team..they like their  work..

name: S L
text: Excellent service to first time visitors and hot tasty food standards you'd want in a pizza place. I would have gave 5 stars, however, not all tables had condiments and dining area wasn't spotless. If they can address those customer experience aspects they'd be perfect.

name: Tariq Saeed
text: It is different than usual oven pizza. They have only one size and it is clay oven baked.

name: Mari Ashurova
text: I love blaze pizza!!! Cauliflower dough is magic!

name: Ahmad Musa
text: Nice place nice pizza, good for a pizza on a rush. Better than giordanos, but I had better.

name: Ryan
text: After they misidentified my pizza my boyfriend got ranch added onto his pizza when it came out of the oven and I wanted less so I asked for "a little bit of ranch" and what I got was more ranch than my boyfriend. My pizza was ranch soup. I …More

name: Silas John
text: This was my first time visit to blaze pizza and I was expecting it to be great. However, the employees were extremely rude and kept telling us to hurry up. I work in a customer service environment and I know how important it is to make a customer feel welcomed. They even refused to split my check. Horrible experience.

name: Lourdes Sosa
text: Not the friendliest staff. My pizza was a little cold. I only came in to kill time. I'm going to stick with MID Pizza

name: Rebecca Carver
text: Great place for lunch. The build your own pizza is the way to go.  I load mine up with all the veggies and it is delicious. One pizza is two meals worth of food so splitting a pizza is always an option if you like the person you're with.

name: Dawn Crossen
text: I like the Individual Pizzas and service was quick, Bathroom needs to be cleaned  other then that, I liked it will go back again, When I'm in Skokie, Illinois

text: Fast made to order pizza that you can customize yourself. It's a nice light option

name: Cody

text: They have really great pizza! But the employees extremely RUDE!!!! I work in customer service and never  treated people like this!!! If I can i’ll give them 0 !!!!!!

text: Clean place, friendly staff. They took the time to explain to a first-comer how things works. Pizza was good, cooked in under 10 minutes. If you don't order an IPA on the side, you miss the whole point :))

name: Ban Haji
text: New manager is needed at the 4999 Skokie store in Illinois.Ethan was the server and he was so rude slow and unprofessional. pizza was undercooked and dough knots were burnt and so cold from being out for 10 minutes. Upper management needs to watch that store because it's a jungle in there .

name: Wuji Fei
text: This is an interesting pizza place. It basically is a Chipotle for pizza. You pick your own ingredients, and the pizza is baked to your liking in like a few minutes. I went in with no expectation but came out happy. I will come back again.

text: Pizza was made fast, but if you are looking for best tasting pizza with a variety of different combinations I would recommend California Pizza Kitchen if you have more time.
